title: Trump's 10,000-Plus Lies & "Avengers: Endgame" Spoiler Backlash | Pete Buttigieg
itunes:title: Trump's 10,000-Plus Lies & "Avengers: Endgame" Spoiler Backlash | Pete Buttigieg
description:
President Trump tells over 10,000 lies while in office, Roy Wood Jr. addresses film spoiler outrage, and 2020 White House hopeful Pete Buttigieg discusses "Shortest Way Home."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
